installer_wait_screen.title: Welcome to fount!
installer_wait_screen.description: Follow the installation's progress and glimpse the features within. fount will be ready to launch in a moment.

hero.title: Imagination, Given Voice.
hero.description: fount is an AI-powered role interaction platform designed to empower you. It is a bridge that connects you with your imagined characters, allowing you to easily talk to them, create your own characters, and share them with the world.

feature1.title: Seamless dialogue, anywhere
feature1.description: Start chatting on your computer and continue seamlessly on your phone or tablet. fount keeps your conversations in sync and stay in touch with your character wherever you go. Runs on Windows, macOS, Linux and even Android.

feature2.title: Beautiful, customisable interface
feature2.description: Choose from over 30 beautiful themes, or create your own. fount is your personal canvas. Express yourself, customise the environment to your preferences, and get a truly personalised experience.

feature3.title: Expressive, immersive chat
feature3.description: fount takes advantage of the power of HTML, allowing characters to express themselves through rich text, images, and even interactive elements. Have dynamic and engaging group chats with multiple characters at the same time.

feature4.title: Unbound AI source integration
feature4.description: fount offers unparalleled choice and flexibility. Connect to any AI sources‚ÄîOpenAI, Claude, OpenRouter, NovelAI, etc. Communication logic will be shaped by the power of code according to your wishes.

theme_selector.title: Choose your appearance
theme_selector.description: Choose a theme to personalise your experience.

mini_game.title: Play a little game
mini_game.description2: Here's a mini game to pass the time.

error.title: Installation failed!
error.description1: There seems to be something wrong with the fount installer.
error.description2: Please check your terminal and try again.

protocolhandler.title: Handling fount Protocol
protocolhandler.description: Silently and efficiently, this page translates your intent into a seamless transition within fount. Consider it the quiet magic behind the curtain.

runPartConfirm.title: Confirm running
runPartConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to run ${parttype} of ${partname}?

offline_dialog.title: Host offline
offline_dialog.message: fount host ${hostUrl} appears to be offline. Do you want to retry?

protocolhandler.fountNotFound:
Oh dear :(

fount was not found. Perhaps you need to install it first?

startPage.title: fount!
startPage.description: Welcome to the threshold of fount. A brief moment of preparation, before stepping into the heart of conversations and stories waiting to unfold.

newTabFailed.title: Failed to open new tab
newTabFailed.instruction: fount's startup is 1-2s slower each time without window pop-up permission.
newTabFailed.tryAllow: Try giving fount window pop-up permission?

ignoreConfirm.title: Confirm permanent ignore?
ignoreConfirm.instruction: Wasting 2s on one start is wasting 1 whole day on fifty thousand starts üíÄ

tutorial.title: Tutorial?
tutorial.description: Let us walk with you through the world of fount. This interactive tutorial will illuminate the path, helping you discover the magic woven into its core. Your adventure begins with understanding.

modal.title: Welcome to fount!
modal.instruction: Would you like to take the introductory tutorial?

endScreen.title: Awesome! Tutorial Completed!
endScreen.subtitle: You're now familiar with the basics!

auth.title: Authentication
auth.subtitle: User data is stored locally
auth.description: Here, you define your presence. Whether returning to a familiar haven or shaping a new space for your stories, this is where your journey with fount begins.

login_info.title: Login Information
login_info.description: A secure space for managing your fount login credentials‚Äîthe keys to your world of untold stories.

home.title: Home
home.description: The heart of your fount experience. Here, manage the denizens of your imagination‚Äîcharacters, worlds, and personas. Your stories begin and branch from this central nexus.
home.itemDescription: Select an item to view details.

worlds.title: World Selection
worlds.subtitle: Choose a world, and immerse yourself!

home.escapeConfirm: Are you sure you want to leave fount?

alerts.fetchHomeRegistryFailed: Failed to fetch home registry information.

first_login.name: Hello, World!
first_login.description: Heading towards the new world, logging in for the first time!
first_login.locked_description: Log in to the fount once.

sfw_mode_on.name: There's someone behind you!
sfw_mode_on.description: Quickly switch to all-ages mode, I am such a clever little kid.
sfw_mode_on.locked_description: Turn on safe content mode once.

sfw_mode_off.name: door to new world
sfw_mode_off.locked_description: Turn off Safe Content Mode once.

set_default_persona.name: This Is The Way.
set_default_persona.description: Set an identity for your actions in this world.

chat.title: Chat
chat.description: Where words take flight and stories unfold. Engage with your AI companions, shape the narrative, and lose yourself in the ebb and flow of digital dialogue. The heart of fount beats here.

new.title: New Chat
new.description: The quiet anticipation of a story yet unwritten. A new chat begins, a clean slate for fresh interactions and unfolding narratives with your chosen companions.

messageList.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this message?

first_chat.name: A New Challenger Appears!
first_chat.description: The first message was sent and the story begins.
first_chat.locked_description: Send your first message with any character.

multiplayer_chat.name: White Album Season
multiplayer_chat.locked_description: Have two or more characters speak in the same chat.

photo_chat.name: There are pictures and the truth
photo_chat.description: Use pictures to break the dimensional wall.

chat_history.title: Chat History
chat_history.description: Journey through dialogues past. Here, memories of conversations linger‚Äîsort, filter, and revisit the stories you've woven with your AI companions. A quiet library of digital echoes.

easynew.title: Quick Create
easynew.description: Quickly scaffold new fount parts like characters, worlds, and plugins using predefined or custom templates. Your next creation is just a few clicks away.

info.description: These templates can only be used to quickly build simple components; complex components still need to be created manually.

easynew.cardTitle: Create a new component from a template

partName.placeholder: Give your new component a name

description.placeholder: Briefly describe what this component is about.

import.title: Import
import.description: Bring your cherished characters, worlds, and configurations into fount's embrace. Whether from file or pasted text, this is where new elements are woven into your personal tapestry.

dropArea.textContent: Drag and drop files here or click to select files

export.title: Component Exporter
export.description: Export your fount creations. This tool gathers your selected parts into a simple zip file for safekeeping or sharing.

options.withDataDescription: Contains files marked as data, such as character memories.

uninstall.description: Should you choose to part ways, this space allows for a graceful farewell. Confirm the removal of components, or fount itself. Paths diverge, yet memories may remain.

userSettings.description: Tend to the details of your fount identity. Manage your profile, safeguard your access, and view connected devices. A quiet sanctum for your account.

languageSettings.description: Manage your language preferences for the fount application. Customise your experience with the available language options.
languageSettings.pageDescription: Manage your language preferences here. The languages ‚Äã‚Äãin the list will take precedence over the browser settings in order.
languageSettings.noPreferredLanguages: No preferred language has been set. Your browser's default settings will be used.

themeManage.title: Theme Management
themeManage.description: Choose the aesthetic that mirrors your mood or story. Preview and select from a palette of themes, each offering a different ambiance for your fount interactions. Your world, your style.

change_theme.name: A Fresh Coat of Paint!
change_theme.description: The fount had a new look and a completely new mood.

browser_integration.title: Browser integration
browser_integration.description: Bridge the gap between fount and the web. This page provides the userscript to enable seamless integration, bringing your AI companions into your browsing experience.
browser_integration.pageDescription: In order for your fount role to interact with the web page, you need to install this browser integration script. It acts as a bridge between the character and the browser, allowing them to view the page content and perform actions.
browser_integration.install_script_description: Click the button below to install the browser integration script. You must first install a userscript manager.
browser_integration.install_from_url_tip: Does your browser not allow you to install it? Copy this URL and import the script from the url in the Tampermonkey plugin.
browser_integration.manager_explanation: A userscript manager is a browser extension that allows you to install and run scripts that modify web pages. To use the fount integration script, you need one of the extensions.
browser_integration.csp_warning: You may need to install the plugin to turn off CSP to make the integration function work properly. For ${browser} you can use [this plugin](${link}).
browser_integration.fetch_pages_error: Failed to load the linked page list.

no_pages_connected.title: No connection yet
no_pages_connected.description: Please install the script first, and then visit any website in other browser tabs, which will be automatically displayed here.

autorun.title: Automatically run scripts
autorun.description: Manage JavaScript snippets that are automatically executed when matching a specific website. These scripts can be provided by your AI role or plug-in to enhance or automate your browsing experience.
autorun.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this script? This operation cannot be cancelled.
autorun.add_success: The automatic running script has been added successfully!
autorun.delete_success: The script has been deleted successfully.

no_scripts.title: No automatic script running
no_scripts.description: You have not configured any scripts yet. Please use the form above to add the first one.

error.load_failed: Failed to load the automatic script: ${message}

install_script.name: Magic, infuse!
install_script.description: You have successfully installed the "plug-in" for your browser, now you can do more.
install_script.locked_description: Install the browser integration script once.

run_js.name: code chant
run_js.locked_description: Run the JavaScript code once in the browser.

update.prompt: A new version of the fount browser integration script is available. Is the update page now open?

browser_integration_script.csp_warning: The fount browser integration script detects that the CSP policy exists on the page, which may cause the integration script to not work properly. Please consider installing the plugin to close the CSP.

hostChange.message:
The current page ("${origin}") is trying to change your fount host address to:

"${newHost}"

Warning: Approving this action will allow the new host to fully control your browser integration features, which may lead to sensitive information leakage or account theft.
Approval should only be made if you are sure that this is your own operation (for example, migrating a fount server).

Are you sure you want to allow this change?
hostChange.uuidMismatchError: fount security error: The identity (UUID) of host ${newHost} does not match your existing one. The operation has been cancelled.
hostChange.verificationError: fount security error: Unable to verify new host "${newHost}". Please check if the address is correct and if the service is running.

terminal_assistant.title: Terminal Assistant
terminal_assistant.description: Beyond the graphical interface, a space for direct command. Interact with fount's core through the terminal assistant, where text weaves its own potent magic.
terminal_assistant.initialMessage: fount supports deploying your favourite characters to your terminal to assist you in coding!

invoke_shell_assist.name: "Hey, fount."
invoke_shell_assist.description: In the dark terminal, the name of the AI ‚Äã‚Äãpartner was called.

deskpet.title: Desktop pets
deskpet.description: Launch your fount characters as interactive pets that live on your desktop.

runningCard.title: running pet
runningCard.noPets: There are currently no pets running.

start_deskpet.name: A new companion to your desktop
start_deskpet.description: It's dangerous to go alone! Take this.

access.title: Access fount on other devices
access.description: Extend fount's reach beyond a single screen. Here lies the gateway‚Äîa URL, a QR code‚Äîto connect with your companions from other devices, a simple bridge across the local ether.
access.heading: Want to access fount on other devices?

instruction.sameLAN: Ensure the device and fount host are on the same local area network.

QRcode.alt: Scan this QR code to access fount

proxy.title: API Proxy
proxy.description: For developers and integrators, this page unveils the fount API proxy‚Äîyour connection for weaving fount's capabilities into other applications.
proxy.heading: API Proxy Gateway
proxy.instruction: Generate and manage your API keys on this page to integrate fount with other applications.
proxy.endpointInstruction: This is the base URL for integration with other services.
proxy.usageExampleInstruction: Here is an example of how to get the list of available models using `curl`.
proxy.noApiKey: You have not generated an API key for this page yet.
proxy.queryStringSectionTitle: Can't set APIKey in request header? (Insecure)
proxy.queryStringWarning: Use this alternative method when your application does not support sending the API key in the request header (Authorization header). Please note: Placing the API key directly in the URL poses a security risk as it may be logged in server logs or browser history.

achievements.title: Achievement
achievements.description: Explore the milestones and accomplishments of your journey with fount. Each achievement marks a step in your unique narrative.
achievements.pageDescription: Check out your unlocked achievements and milestones here.

open_achievements_page.name: Gotta Catch 'Em All!
open_achievements_page.description: Opened the achievement list and prepared to start a stamp collecting journey.

badges_maker.title: fount! Badge Converter
badges_maker.description: For when your project calls for a touch of fount's character. Convert shields.io badges, lending them a new, resonant identity.

new_url.placeholder: The converted URL will be displayed here

404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: The path you sought has dissolved into mist. Was it a misstep, a forgotten turn? Allow us to guide you back to shore, or perhaps, pause for a game amidst the quiet void.
404.pageNotFoundText: Oops! It seems you've stumbled upon a page that doesn't exist.

warnings.straightRow: Straight rows of keys on your keyboard are easy to guess.
warnings.keyPattern: Short keyboard patterns are easy to guess.
warnings.simpleRepeat: Repeated characters like "aaa" are easy to guess.
warnings.extendedRepeat: Repeated character patterns like "abcabcabc" are easy to guess.
warnings.sequences: Common character sequences like "abc" are easy to guess.
warnings.recentYears: Recent years are easy to guess.
warnings.topTen: This is a heavily used password.
warnings.topHundred: This is a frequently used password.
warnings.common: This is a commonly used password.
warnings.similarToCommon: This is similar to a commonly used password.
warnings.wordByItself: Single words are easy to guess.
warnings.namesByThemselves: Single names or surnames are easy to guess.
warnings.commonNames: Common names and surnames are easy to guess.
warnings.userInputs: There should not be any personal or page related data.
warnings.pwned: Your password was exposed by a data breach on the Internet.

suggestions.l33t: Avoid predictable letter substitutions like '@' for 'a'.
suggestions.reverseWords: Avoid reversed spellings of common words.
suggestions.allUppercase: Capitalise some, but not all letters.
suggestions.capitalization: Capitalise more than the first letter.
suggestions.dates: Avoid dates and years that are associated with you.
suggestions.associatedYears: Avoid years that are associated with you.
suggestions.longerKeyboardPattern: Use longer keyboard patterns and change typing direction multiple times.
suggestions.anotherWord: Add more words that are less common.
suggestions.useWords: Use multiple words, but avoid common phrases.
suggestions.noNeed: You can create strong passwords without using symbols, numbers, or uppercase letters.
suggestions.pwned: If you use this password elsewhere, you should change it.
